column2: Is not tribal or publicly practice an evil religion

My friends, i have decided that this year we have pressing matters to attend to... Enemies sorround our peacefull tribes from all around, and soon we might face catastrophy or even extiction. I propose we join forces and disband our enemies as a single force, making sure they wont come back to destroy us in a near future. May i count on your support?
Yes i will support you when the call to arms happens...
No, my tribe has more important issues to handle right now...
Will be given the option to ponder on your request.
My brother, your cause has ringed in my peoples heart as this threat does seem to affect all of us. We will support you in the upcoming war, give me the call and i shall answer!
A gathering can only happen every 10 years.
